meanings.sent1: The attic was filled with superfluities that we never used.
meanings.sent2: She decided to declutter her room and get rid of all the superfluities.
meanings.sent3: The garage sale was a success, thanks to the superfluities we sold.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was cluttered with superfluities, making it hard to focus on what truly mattered.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overrun with superfluities, overshadowing the beauty of the flowers.

meanings.sent1: He realized he needed to cut down on his superfluities to save money.
meanings.sent2: The vacation package included many superfluities that made the trip more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: Buying designer clothes was a superfluity she indulged in occasionally.
meanings.sent4: The luxury car was a superfluity he couldn't resist, even though it strained his budget.
meanings.sent5: The extravagant party was filled with superfluities that impressed the guests.
